author: karlgandhi360
title: Cardano Discord Integration
description: Many projects on Cardano have discord servers for their community however they are no discord bots to make interaction with Cardano easier.

author: mark
title: Trust Funds by Ada
description: Creating a Trust is expensive and complicated.As wealth is created in the blockchain ecosystem people will need ways to share and manage it.

author: matthiasksieber
title: Revenue Share Token Smart Contract
description: There are currently no open source smart contracts for Revenue Share Tokens applications, which could be used by many different platforms.

author: volibra
title: Ada Donation Widget
description: There is no Ada Donation Widget for website and Github project  to receive donations.

author: altimario
title: 1st universal E-learning connector
description: E-learning platform vendors prevent data interoperability and learners can't certify skills across overlapping courses and platforms.

author: manfo2021
title: Small Change Wallet
description: In Cameroon, finding the right change to match purchases of everyday goods and services is a huge challenge affecting local communities.

author: mqp
title: A Community Vesting Dapp
description: As of December 2021, there does not exist a trusted, open-sourced, and go-to solution for vesting smart contracts in the Cardano community.

author: fellx27
title: The Tipchecker
description: Sometimes it's hard to understand if your cardano node(s) synced with the network properly. Is it stuck? Or does it have stable undersync?

author: gorgonzola
title: Wall of Gum - A Novel Virtual Place
description: Ported dApps are coming - Cardano needs home-grown, one-of-a-kind dApps to serve our awesome community. We will need fun dApps beyond DEXes!

author: carnivilla
title: QR Code NFT Distribution Tool
description: Marketing, Onboarding, and Gaming systems bottlenecked by the current transaction system.

author: mybrandt
title: ODEURADA
description:
Integrating scents into crypto.
We all need to get that little renewed energy a day and what is better than having a scent created for you?

author: gradyw
title: 3D Design and Print NFT Spacecoins
description: NFTs need physical products with 3D Designs to represent and manifest for community adoption beyond crypto experts.

author: travisyatsko
title: Mobile App: NFT/Token Gallery
description: NFT images can be difficult for the average consumer to access, downloading files from IPFS is not as intuitive for the average consumer.

author: volibra
title: Ada payment link generator
description: Lack of Ada Payment Links generator to sell digital good online without a website

author: antoine.cathalau
title: Qinesis: QiGong & mindfulness Dapp
description: There is no mindfulness dapp yet, leaving a big gap for user acquisition.

author: coire1
title: Tales In The Blocks|Collab-writing
description: Writing and drawing are seen as single person activity, what could be the result of a collaborative piece?

author: passthenachos
title: Flat Rules Based Abstracted P2P Net
description: On-Chain DApp processing consumes network bandwidth and often reprocesses redundant files. Users of DApps utilize chain resources equally

author: sikaffy27
title: Decentralised Dating Application
description: Online dating has become essential to our society but centralized dating apps fail at helping people find suitable romantic partners.

author: cobblecat
title: Endubis Messenger Wallet
description: Inconvenience while conducting payment with ADA. All existing wallets are not friendly for those new to the crypto space.

author: sgralla
title: smart contract tutoring
description: Tutoring markets are highly inefficient: Students pay a ton, while tutors keep little.

author: tatzmiki
title: Indigo NFT for Sustainable Fashion
description: People have no idea where the colors used in their clothing come from and what they are made of, and that is a serious problem for everyone.

author: ben.mesnik
title: Seed Liquidity Pools for NFT DeFi
description: NFT liquidity pools, which are essential for using NFTs in DeFi, are ineffective in the case of low liquidity.

author: linconvidal
title: CardaBot: telegram bot with tipping
description: Cardano-related Telegram bots are focused on monitoring. There is no way to tip ada to other users, especially in a non-custodial approach.

author: reshm
title: Loyalty Tokens for Businesses
description: Business-oriented use cases incentivise commercial adoption of Cardano. Better if it's something that can help reach their customers too.

author: skryptlabs
title: Rarety - SC based NFT drop platform
description: There is no smart contract based CNFT drops platform for new projects to launch.

author: gpkumar24
title: Receipt Wallet
description: Receipts, Bills, Invoices hard to keep track and also these has lot of untold stories and information

author: abehazbunjr
title: Native Collections (CNFT Pinterest)
description: CNFT traders and businesses need to be able to host custom combinations of NFTs while protecting themselves from "wallet bombing".
